rules_text:
Indestructible
[i]Ragnell and Alondite[/i] – Whenever Altina, Tellius Hero enters or attacks, destroy target permanent. Put X +1/+1 counters onto Altina, where X is the mana value of that permanent destroyed this way.
[i]Ashera's Chosen – [/i]Altina can't be blocked by creatures with lesser power than her.
[i]Founder of Begnion[/i] – When Altina leaves the battlefield, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is her power.
